description: Ranma is Ranma-Chan and Genma is a big panda so they do get to see Ranma`s mom. After a few days she decides it`s time to leave but Akane won`t let this happen. With Genma distracted she arranges for Ranma to meet his mom.

titles.title: Boy Meets Mom, Part 2: Someday, Somehow...
いつの日か, きっと...
